Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present 615-617 E 16th Avenue, a rare opportunity to invest in Vancouver's highly sought after Mount Pleasant neighborhood.The subject property is a commercial zoned site improved with a two-storey mixed use building. The ground floor commercial unit is currently tenanted by Purple Dragon Martial Arts and built-out as a Dojo. The second floor consists of 2 two-bedroom residentialsuites.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | RETAIL BUILDING IN MOUNT PLEASANT WITH HOLDING AND REDEVELOPMENT VALUE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present an exceptional retail investment opportunity in one of Vancouver’s most sought after neighborhoods, Olympic Village / Southeast False Creek. The Retail @ Opsal Tower comprises of two (2) fully leased retail strata units tenanted by Starbucks Coffee and Tractor Foods. The property is prominently situated on the corner of Quebec & 2nd Avenue, surrounded by exceptional retailers, newly constructed luxury residential towers and the funky office/industrial hub of Mount Pleasant. Centered amongst retailers, restaurants, cafes, and breweries, including MEC, Brewhall, Urban Fair and Science World, the property is in close proximity to Main Street & Olympic Village SkyTrain Station and bus stops offering quick transport to numerous Downtown locations including Yaletown, West End & Granville Island.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | EXCEPTIONAL RETAIL INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present an exciting opportunity to own an exceptional, long term investment property in the heart of Mount Pleasant, one of Vancouver's most vibrant and establishedneighbourhoods.The opportunity is comprised of three (3) ground floor retail strata units in the Vya Lving building. Vya Living is a 6-storey, mixed use building located just steps to the Kingsway and Broadway intersection - one of the busiest intersections in East Vancouver.The current tenant, Spin Society, has term until 2029, providing a secure, long term investment.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | RETAIL @ VYA LIVING - EXCEPTIONAL MT PLEASANT RETAIL INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Along Granville Street, between West 6th and West 7th Avenue
Along Granville Street, between West 6th and West 7th Avenue

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to exclusively offer for sale two properties located at 2211 and 2213 Granville Street situated within Vancouver’s Fairview (South Granville) neighbourhood. Located on the west side of Granville Street between West 6th Avenue and West 7th Avenue, the properties are well-positioned in Vancouver’s West Side, centrally located in the South Granville Shopping District and in walking distance to the Broadway Corridor. Short commutes to Downtown Vancouver and proximity to lifestyle amenities on the West Side. The Property has potential for multi-residential re-development for rental housing under considerations of the City of Vancouver’s rental programs, with potential to achieve higher density as a transit-oriented site (currently under review with the City). 2213 Granville Street is currently occupied by Dog Swim Vancouver and 2211 Granville Street is currently occupied with Paul’s Omelettery Restaurant.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | TRANSIT ORIENTED OFFICE/RETAIL REPOSITIONING OPPORTUNITY WITH POTENTIAL FOR MULTI-RESIDENTIAL DEVELOPMENT

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Along Granville Street, between West 6th and West 7th Avenue
Along Granville Street, between West 6th and West 7th Avenue

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to offer for sale a future purpose built mixed-use rental development site with holding income.  The Subject Property is conveniently located next to the intersection of Oak Street and West 49th Avenue in Vancouver’s west-side. Under the policies of the Cambie Corridor Plan, the subject property is designated “mixed use with rental housing” allowing for new densities of up to 3.0 or 4.0 FSR depending on site assembly and affordable housing requirements.  With residential rental vacancies at historical lows throughout Metro Vancouver, this offering represents an opportunity to secure a strategic parcel for future rental development in an excellent location.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | DEVELOPMENT SITE WITH HOLDING INCOME
